title: Drawing, "Cloudy Sky over Outlined Hills, Ecuador", July 23, 1857
markings: Verso:  Stamped in ink, at center: Lugt 457d
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, with figures at various locations; again, at upper right: 8- warm reflections / 4 Gold white / 9- yellow strong little smoky; again, at upper far right:  2- open sky  3 - Rich orange / 4- Concentrated light / 5- delicate cool blue purple / 6- curious dark purple / 7- blended -obscure luminous; and again at lower right:  Sabereta July 23d / 57
description: Horizontal view with two trees standing on outlined hills in the foreground below a multi-layered cloudy sky.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, "Cloudy Sky over Outlined Hills, Ecuador", July 23, 1857.
July 23, 1857. Graphite on light cream-colored paper. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-113.
